languages.text: "На фоне всех мрачных событий и не менее мрачного семейства вашего супруга, сегодня вы, Регина, выглядите чарующе".

traits.locale_text: "На фоне всех мрачных событий и не менее мрачного семейства вашего супруга, сегодня вы, Регина, выглядите чарующе".

languages.text: "Set against the doom and gloom of current events and your husband's dour family, you look especially dazzling today, Regina."
languages.original_text: "На фоне всех мрачных событий и не менее мрачного семейства вашего супруга, сегодня вы, Регина, выглядите чарующе".

traits.locale_text: "Regina, you look especially brilliant today, against the gloomy backdrop of the current events and your husband's relatives."
"Regina, you look especially brilliant today, against the gloomy backdrop of the current events and your husband's relatives."
"Regina, you look especially brilliant today, compared to the gloom and doom of the current events and your husband's dismal family."
"Regina, you look especially brilliant today, compared to the gloom and doom of the current events and your husband's dismal family."
"Set against the doom and gloom of current events and your husband's dour family, you look especially dazzling today, Regina."
"Set against the doom and gloom of current events and your husband's dour family, you look especially dazzling today, Regina."

languages.text: 「昨今の嘆かわしい事態や、主人の陰気な一族とは対照的に、今日は一段と輝いて見えるじゃないか、レジーナ」
languages.original_text: "Set against the doom and gloom of current events and your husband's dour family, you look especially dazzling today, Regina."

traits.locale_text: 「昨今の嘆かわしい事態や、主人の陰気な一族とは対照的に、今日は一段と輝いて見えるじゃないか、レジーナ」

languages.text: “蕾吉娜，在这愁云惨淡的气氛和你夫家这群老古板的衬托下，你真是格外光彩照人。”
languages.original_text: "Set against the doom and gloom of current events and your husband's dour family, you look especially dazzling today, Regina."

traits.locale_text: “蕾吉娜，在这愁云惨淡的气氛和你夫家这群老古板的衬托下，你真是格外光彩照人。”

languages.text: « Régina, vous êtes tout bonnement resplendissante. Vous êtes comme un rayon de soleil en cette journée lugubre. »
languages.original_text: "Set against the doom and gloom of current events and your husband's dour family, you look especially dazzling today, Regina."

traits.locale_text: « Régina, vous êtes tout bonnement resplendissante. Vous êtes comme un rayon de soleil en cette journée lugubre. »

languages.text: «Entre la tristeza de los acontecimientos recientes y la sobriedad de la familia de su esposo, hoy está especialmente radiante, Regina».
languages.original_text: "Set against the doom and gloom of current events and your husband's dour family, you look especially dazzling today, Regina."

traits.locale_text: «Entre la tristeza de los acontecimientos recientes y la sobriedad de la familia de su esposo, hoy está especialmente radiante, Regina».

languages.text: "Wenn man die aktuelle Situation hinsichtlich der verdrießlichen Familie Eures Gatten bedenkt, seht Ihr heute besonders reizend aus, Regina."
languages.original_text: "Set against the doom and gloom of current events and your husband's dour family, you look especially dazzling today, Regina."

traits.locale_text: "Regina, Ihr strahlt heute ganz besonders, vor dem Hintergrund der düsteren und tristen Ereignisse und der erbärmlichen Familie Eures Gemahls."

languages.text: "Gündemdeki olayların kasvetine ve kocanın aksi ailesine karşın bugün bilhassa büyüleyicisin Regina."
languages.original_text: "Set against the doom and gloom of current events and your husband's dour family, you look especially dazzling today, Regina."

traits.locale_text: "Gündemdeki olayların kasvetine ve kocanın aksi ailesine karşın bugün bilhassa büyüleyicisin Regina."
